item.title: Known Sigma 400's
item.description: boats A very fast cruiser racer of Rob Humphries hull design based on the 1988 Whitbread Maxi “Rothmans”. She delivers spectacularly in heavy weather with balance, stability and no slamming Baiji ? Prime Evil - South costs? Miss behaving? Sunrise - Clyde - 1993 Nathalia - Dublin - 1992 Intemperance (Jagga / Jenny Mac 2/ Hindsight) - Brighton - 1992 Triptych (Keep Smiling) - Dartmouth - 1992 Raging Bull - (Wrecked?
